comments.author: eviatarbach@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux x86_64; en-CA; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux x86_64; en-CA; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.13

In a similar fashion to Windows 7, the Linux Compiz compositing system has a Window Previews plugin, and this is extended by applications like DockbarX to include Aero Peek-like functionality. Thus, it would be useful to have window previews for individual tabs.

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: eviatarbach@gmail.com

In a similar fashion to Windows 7, the Linux Compiz compositing system has a Window Previews plugin, and this is extended by applications like DockbarX to include Aero Peek-like functionality. Thus, it would be useful to have window previews for individual tabs.

Reproducible: Always
